title: Binary to Byte Conversion
description: BIN_TO_BYTE converts a binary encoded string in a BYTE va￾lue. There, this method only binary characters are '0 'and '1' is interpre￾ted, others in BIN occurring characters are ignored.
name: BIN_TO_BYTE

input.name: BIN
input.description: A binary string consisting of '0's and '1's with a maximum length of 12 characters.

output.name: BIN_TO_BYTE
output.description: The resulting byte value obtained from the binary string.

return_value.description: The byte value that represents the input binary string.
